Name: PETROMAGERR_U
Description: Petrosian apparent magnitude error in u-band

Name: PETROMAGERR_G
Description: Petrosian apparent magnitude error in g-band

Name: PETROMAGERR_R
Description: Petrosian apparent magnitude error in r-band

Name: PETROMAGERR_I
Description: Petrosian apparent magnitude error in i-band

Name: PETROMAGERR_Z
Description: Petrosian apparent magnitude error in z-band

Name: FIBERMAG_R
Description: Spectroscopic fiber (3 arcsec) magnitude in r-band

Name: DEVMAG_R
Description: model magnitude from pure de Vaucouleurs profile fit in r-band [mag]

Name: DEVMAGERR_R
Description: model magnitude error from pure deVaucouleurs profile fit in r-band

Name: EXPMAG_R
Description: model magnitude from pure exponential profile fit in r-band

Name: EXPMAGERR_R
Description: model magnitude error from pure exponential profile fit in r-band

Name: FRACDEV_R
Description: coefficient of de Vaucouleurs component in linear combination of models in r-band

Name: MU50_R
Description: surface brightness within Petrosian 50% r-band radius

Name: ROWC_U
Description: row center position (r' coordinates) in u-band

Name: COLC_U
Description: column center position (r' coordinates) in u-band

Name: ROWC_G
Description: row center position (r' coordinates) in g-band

Name: COLC_G
Description: column center position (r' coordinates) in g-band

Name: ROWC_R
Description: row center position (r' coordinates) in r-band

Name: COLC_R
Description: column center position (r' coordinates) in r-band

Name: ROWC_I
Description: row center position (r' coordinates) in i-band

Name: COLC_I
Description: column center position (r' coordinates) in i-band

Name: ROWC_Z
Description: row center position (r' coordinates) in z-band

Name: COLC_Z
Description: column center position (r' coordinates) in z-band

Name: CMODELMAGERR_R
Description: composite model magnitude error in r-band

Name: PETROMAGERR_MU
Description: Petrosian absolute magnitude error in u-band

Name: PETROMAGERR_MG
Description: Petrosian absolute magnitude error in g-band

Name: PETROMAGERR_MR
Description: Petrosian absolute magnitude error in r-band

Description: Petrosian absolute magnitude error in i-band
